page.title: 06Leisure and Recreation
page.content: I am Louise and I like listening to and making music. I read a lot and enjoy writing. I love looking after my pets especially my cat Bag-puss. I enjoy going to the theatre with mummy I have collections of badges and thimbles. My daddy does not have much leisure time but he has many hobbies. He likes animals and birds and he has a large model railway. My mummy likes sewing and knitting. She makes corn dollies and she loves music and her guitar. Laura, my sister, is three and she likes playing with her dollies and she likes stories.
